DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Costs 0 [E] if you haven't played a card yet on your turn.
When the owner dies, deals damage to a random enemy.
Gain Block at the end of your turn for the amount of Icebody you have. Reduced by 1 every time a card is played.
Two cards of the same name.
Returns to the top of your draw pile when played instead of discarded.
